newsitem.title: USA: American Filtrona to continue merger talks.
newsitem.headline: American Filtrona to continue merger talks.

text.p: American Filtrona Corp said Wednesday it plans to continue merger negotiations with WBT Holdings LLC after a lawsuit involving several trusts that own the company's shares was settled.
The lawsuit involved beneficiaries of certain trusts for the benefit of members of the family of former Chairman R.H. Bunzl and a co-trustee of those trusts.

The lawsuit had alleged that the trustee's concurrent service as co-trustee for the Walter Bunzl trusts as well as the R.H. Bunzl trusts represented a conflict of interest with respect to the proposed merger.
R.H. and Walter Bunzl were brothers. Walter Bunzl was a 28 percent shareholder of WBT Holdings who left his stock in family trusts, some of which are associated with R.H. Bunzl.
The company did not disclose the terms of the settlement.
